profile:
AT FRESH LOOK DESIGN, IT’S ALL ABOUT YOU!

INTERIOR DECORATING

We help homeowners elevate their homes so they can come home to a space that they enjoy and want to spend time in.  By working with them, they can save time, energy, stay on budget and have it done right the first time.

At Fresh Look Design, our mission is simple - We strive to offer a relationship-based approach to Interior Design. By listening and understanding our client’s ideas, goals and budget to ensure your home is functional, stylish and cohesive. 

We specialize in Custom Blinds, Shades and Window Treatments.

Livening Up Your Living Spaces since 2004!

REAL ESTATE STAGING

We help your Buyers fall in love with your property.  Did you know that approximately 40% of all active listings expire?  The difference between listing or selling your property is how it looks to Buyers.  The way you live in your home is not necessarily what the Buyer is looking for.

We neutralize your house so that it appeals to the most Buyers in the market.  It also involves showcasing the selling features, traffic flow, sight lines, spaciousness and value of the property.

Our professional advice helps you hang onto more of your hard-earned equity. Real Estate Staging is valuable in both a Buyer’s and Seller’s market.  In a Buyer’s market, it will make your property stand out and sell faster.  In a Seller’s market, it is the difference between an offer and multiple offers.

We help you uncover the hidden potential of your property and boost your Buyer appeal!
